name.ja: <ruby>再世の戦神<rt>リジェネシス・ウォリアー</rt></ruby> ベレシート

text.en: If a monster with 2500 original ATK or DEF is on the field, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Regenesis Warrior Beresheet" once per turn this way. You can only use each of the following effects of "Regenesis Warrior Beresheet" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; return it to the hand. During your opponent's End Phase, if this card is in your GY because it was sent there this turn: You can add it to your hand.
